scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:animation && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.copy:wasm: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const srcDir = path.join('build', 'webgpu'); if (!fs.existsSync(srcDir)) fs.mkdirSync(srcDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync('scripts/webgpu/webgpu-particles.wasm', 'build/webgpu-particles.wasm');"
scripts.foundry: node -e "const config = require('./foundry-config.json'); const { spawn } = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); const appPath = config.foundryAppPath || config.foundryPath; if (!appPath) { console.error('No foundryAppPath or foundryPath found in config'); process.exit(1); } const foundryDir = path.dirname(appPath); spawn('node', [appPath, ...(config.args || [])], { stdio: 'inherit', cwd: foundryDir });"
